name: 7 Diamonds
description:
Music Created By FATHER STAR, Design By HANK CHEESECAKE and YUNG ESCO

Made for the Mini Game Jam, you play as a grandfather who overdoses on pills in order to find the spirit of his deceased wife. You must navigate through your mind in order to reach the after life and reunite with your wife's spirit. While on your journey, you must avoid mangled spirits lost in purgatory.

This was my first time making a game in a really long time. I wanted to make something I thought was kinda cool and this was the result. I'm sorry if it's not high quality, I'm learning as I go.

Arrow Keys for movement, "R" to restart level.

UPDATE: Updated the game to add music and fix various bugs!
